objects.description: Cobalt Strike allows adversaries to modify the way the "beacon" payload communicates. This is called "Malleable C2" in the Cobalt Strike manual and is intended to allow a penetration test team to mimic known APT C2 methods.

external_references.description: Strategic Cyber LLC. (2017, March 14). Cobalt Strike Manual. Retrieved May 24, 2017.
Mudge, R. (2014, July 14). Github Malleable-C2-Profiles safebrowsing.profile. Retrieved June 18, 2017.

objects.x_mitre_detection: {{LinkById|S0154}} allows adversaries to modify the way the "beacon" payload communicates. This is called "Malleable C2" in the {{LinkById|S0154}} manual and is intended to allow a penetration test team to mimic known APT C2 methods.
